provinces.name: Alberta
provinces.description: Edmonton is a vibrant urban centre in the heart of the wilderness, the largest northernmost metropolis, and the capital of Alberta, Canada.

provinces.name: Quebec
provinces.description: Quebec is one of the thirteen provinces and territories of Canada. It is the largest province by area and the second-largest by population.

provinces.name: Ontario
provinces.description: Located in Central Canada, Ontario is the country's most populous province. As of the 2021 Canadian census, it is home to 38.5 percent of the country's population.
